alert.note: Alert for Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 13 at 10:26PM CST until December 13 at 11:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN SUNFLOWER AND NORTHWESTERN LEFLORE COUNTIES... At 1026 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Sunflower, or near Indianola, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Sunflower around 1035 PM CST. Blaine around 1040 PM CST. Sunnyside around 1105 PM CST. Minter City around 1110 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Schlater and Doddsville. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
